readable.title: 2635400219_2e1a984fd3
readable.content: A middle eastern woman wearing a blue headscarf sits next to a boy in blue clothes . A woman and a boy are both wearing blue traditional Arab clothes A woman and young man kneel beside a wall while dressed in blue themed clothing . A woman in a headscarf and a boy wearing blue look to the right while sitting against a wall . A woman wearing a scarf on her head sits next to a young boy wearing blue .
